Miles Sound System SDK 6.6h

MILES_DLS_UNLOAD

The basic type MILES_DLS_UNLOAD describes optional DLS unload flags.

Fundamental Values

 Value  Description
 AIL_DLS_UNLOAD_MINE unload all DLS data that this application has loaded.
 AIL_DLS_UNLOAD_ALL unload all DLS data loaded by any application.


Group: DLS Services
Related Functions: AIL_DLS_unload
